ThingDef.label: sororitas power armor
ThingDef.description: Power Armour is a completely enclosed suit of armour, composed of thick ceramite plates and equpped with plug ports that link directly to the user's muscular system. It's weight is mostly compensated by the fibre bundle network within the armour itself, thus making it significantly less restraining than the carapace armour.n\n\Suits of power armour commonly used by the Adepta Sororitas are the only thing that reminds about the Age of Apostasy. While this kind of power armour does not require the enchancements of an Astartes Space Marine, such suits still utilize a similar principle and will offer a remarkable degree of protection, as long as the armour itself is properly maintained.

ThingDef.label: sororitas light power helmet
ThingDef.description: The 'Sabbat' Pattern Sororitas Helm is equpped with a communication device and a rebreather unit, making it suitable for operation in hazardous enviroments as well as enviroments with little to no oxygen avalible. It is also capable of shielding user's sensory organs from hazardous psycho-visual and auditory influence that is commonly associated with chaos taint.

ThingDef.label: light power armor
ThingDef.description: Power Armour is a completely enclosed suit of armour, composed of thick ceramite plates and equpped with plug ports that link directly to the user's muscular system. It's weight is mostly compensated by the fibre bundle network within the armour itself, thus making it significantly less restraining than the carapace armour.n\n\Such suits are commonly used by the Inquisition, planetary governors and other members of imperial elite, as well as Rouge Traders and their retinue.

ThingDef.label: light power helmet
ThingDef.description: Light power armour helmet is designed to be used with a suit of power armour to ensure the closed air circulation, which should provide enough safety in hazardous enviroments, as well areas with little to no breathable air. Power armour helmets are outfitted with photolenses, communication equipment, rebreather and low-light vision devices, on top of providing a substantial degree of protection against most kinds of damage.

ThingDef.label: rebreather mask
ThingDef.description: Rebreather device, commonly used in power armour helmets. Can be used in situations that require a sealed air circulation, but also require the user to rely on natural perception.
